issues.details: Xi stated that Taiwan's Chinese sovereignty is an important part of the international order.

confirmed_facts: Xi Jinping called US President Donald Trump on 2025-11-25.
During the call, Xi said Taiwan belongs to China and is important to international order.
Xi said US-China relations improved after the October Busan summit.

timeline.event: Busan summit between Trump and Xi.
Xi calls Trump and announces Taiwan sovereignty stance.
